text:
I'm using Ant 1.3 with Xalan 2 (by replacing $ANT_HOME/lib's jaxp and parser 
jars with xalan and xerces).  I am using the default XSLTLiaison, trax.
The style task complains if you don't supply a destdir parameter ("destdir 
attributes must be set!").

BUG: If you use style with the in and out parameters, the output location 
ignores destdir.

Example: If I set destdir param to "output_folder", here is the output of ant 
-verbose:
    [style] Transforming into /my_dir/tests/bugs/output_folder
    [style] Using class org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.TraXLiaison
    [style] Loading stylesheet /my_dir/tests/bugs/test.xsl
    [style] Processing /my_dir/tests/bugs/junk.xml to 
/my_dir/tests/bugs/out.html
Note how the style task *says* it's going to transform into output_folder, but 
it does not use it.

build.xml file:
Here is a simple build.xml that demonstrates the problem:
<?xml version="1.0"?>

<project name="xml_format" default="all" basedir=".">

<target name="init">
    <mkdir dir="output_folder"/>
</target>

<target name="all" depends="init">
    <!--
        NOTE: you have to supply a destdir
        BUG:  Xalan 2 with trax processor (the default)
              does not use destdir with out parameter.
    -->
    <style
        destdir="output_folder"
        style="test.xsl"
        in="junk.xml"
        out="out.html"
        />
</target>

</project>
creator: spage@macromedia.com

text:
fixed in nightly build 2001-03-20.

destdir is no longer required if out has been specified.
